original_title: 先生、私の体に火をつけないで
overview: A film debut work by Mr. Sokkuri, Toe Chie, who was talked about as a parody version adult video "Stewardess story" etc. Other performances include Akira Mano , Takeshita Yukari etc., the director is Ryuichi Hiroki , the steel is Kinichi Tanaka .
title: Teacher, Don't Turn Me On!
